title: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of UDCPR
clause_text: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of UDCPR. However, in the URS, wherever the design of the buildings up to 24.0 m. height in the same land requires some relaxation, the same may be given by the Commissioner; buildings having height exceeding 24.0 m. Shall be permissible only on access having width of 9.0 m. or more.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
